channel.title: Mocks on Guowei Lv
channel.description: Recent content in Mocks on Guowei Lv

item.title: Are Stubs and Mocks Harmful?
item.description: I stumbled upon this video, and boy it is so amazing! (if you ignore the annoying audience asking non-stop some annoying questions). This is clearly one of the most inspiring videos I have ever watched. So I must take some notes down and spread the idea as well. I deeply believe that it is actually easy to make things complicated, on the contrary, it is hard to make things simple and elegant.
